name: Parking Lot Royale
detailed_description:
Parking Lot Royale is a multiplayer demolition derby party game that puts you behind the wheel of a fully destructible automobile. Choose your ride and take to the streets, but don't forget to smash your friends!

Launch, dent, and blast your way to victory online against up to 9 others in one of 3 different game modes. Indulge in some competitive road rage with king of the lot mode. Show your friends who's dopest by being last car standing in sumo mode. Or mix things up with several wacky weaponized powerups to bring the pain in deathmatch mode.

short_description: Parking Lot Royale is a multiplayer demolition derby party game that puts you behind the wheel of a fully destructible automobile. Choose your ride and take to the streets, but don't forget to smash your friends!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7+
  • Процессор: 2.4 GHz Quad Core
  • Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 / ATI Radeon HD 5570 / Intel HD Graphics 4200
  • DirectX: Версии 10
  • Сеть: Широкополосное подключение к интернету
  • Место на диске: 4 GB
